thread.title: Evidence Based Practice Courses: CEUs For Athletic Trainers Just Released
thread.title_full: Evidence Based Practice Courses: CEUs For Athletic Trainers Just Released

author: DeAndrea Laub
title: Evidence Based Practice Courses: CEUs For Athletic Trainers Just Released
text:
AthleticTraining.com, provider of CEUs for athletic trainers and other rehab professionals, today announced the release of ten hours of new premium on-demand video Evidence Based Practice courses that meet the requirements for Board of Certification members. Athletic Trainers certified before 2014 must complete 50 CEUs before December 31, 2015, which must include at least 10 Evidence Based Practice (EBP) CEUs. Specifically developed to meet all parameters for EBP courses set by the BOC, these online continuing education courses for athletic trainers are now included in all AthleticTraining.com memberships, which grant professionals unlimited sports medicine CEs for one flat fee.
With the addition of these five continuing education courses totaling 10 hours of EBP content, Athletic Trainers can now complete the entirety of their BOC continuing education requirements with a membership to AthleticTraining.com.
The new courses are:
Evaluation and Treatment of the Adolescent Overhead Athlete
Evaluation and Treatment of Adhesive Capsulitis: A Paradigm Shift
Evaluation and Treatment of Non-Surgical and Surgical SLAP Disorders
Nutrition for Endurance Athletes: Evidence Based Protocols
Applying Research to Practice
AthleticTraining.com continuing education courses are presented by prominent instructors, including the ground-breaking team at The Andrews Research and Education Foundation. Video courses are filmed in full color, with the ability to see and hear the presenter and watch demonstrative video. Each course also includes a downloadable study guide and course notes.
About AthleticTraining.com
Powered by HomeCEUConnection.com, AthleticTraining.com offers elite online continuing education courses for Athletic Trainers, Physical Therapists, Physical Therapist Assistants, Occupational Therapists, Occupational Therapist Assistants. Memberships grant professionals unlimited sports medicine CEs for a flat fee. AthleticTraining.com courses strictly adhere to all Board of Certification requirements.
